places.name: Lancaster, OH
places.description: I was born in Lancaster, but I don't remember it very much. I lived in the nearby town of Sugar Grove as well. I am excluding Lancaster from the list of places where I was going to school, for the sake of a test case. I actually did do Elementary school at a school called Berne Union.

places.name: Logan, OH
places.description: My family moved to Logan, Ohio because they had classes for 'gifted' students and I had good grades.

places.name: Athens, OH
places.description: A love Athens and Ohio University. I studied Computer Science and Japanese here, and it was when I started going to the gym. Lost a lot of weight.

places.name: Hilliard, OH
places.description: First job out of college was in Hilliard, working at a company called eRetailing. Wrote a bunch of Perl and Ruby. I was able to learn alot from the senior engineers and tech lead there. I miss them.

places.name: Tokyo, Japan
places.description: Finally got a job in Japan, moved to Tokyo for on the job training in business manners and Japanese. Lived in a share house in Saginomiya. Made some great friends.

places.name: Kyoto, Japan
places.description: Moved to Kyoto to work on a project at KCCS. Things didn't work out and the temp agency's contract fell through, so I ended up working at Applied Technologies in Osaka.

places.name: Osaka, Japan
places.description: I moved from Kyoto to Osaka, because Kyoto grew to be boring and I wanted to live closer to the office.
